User-agent: *
Disallow: *.css
Disallow: *.js
Disallow: *.svg
Disallow: /images/
Disallow: /js/

User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: *.css
Disallow: *.js
Disallow: *.svg
Disallow: /images/
Disallow: /js/

User-agent: Googlebot-Mobile
Disallow: *.css
Disallow: *.js
Disallow: *.svg
Disallow: /images/
Disallow: /js/

User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Disallow: *.svg
Disallow: /images/
